DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine prevalence back pain permanent wheelchair user ( excludes transitory user ) different region Spain . Another study objective identification risk factor back pain population . Data collection mean structured questionnaire validate previous pilot study .
DOC.brief_title: Back Pain Prevalence Wheelchair Users Associated Risk Factors
